title: Crush to collab with Pink Sweat$
text: Singer-songwriter Crush will be dropping a collaboration with U.S. R&B musician Pink Sweat$ on Oct. 31, Warner Music Korea and P Nation said in a joint press release on Thursday.“Crush and Pink Sweat$ will drop their single ‘I Wanna Be Yours’ on Oct. 31 through music streaming platforms worldwide,” the statement said.Warner Music Korea uploaded a video of Pink Sweat$ speaking in Korean on Wednesday.“We have a lot of Pink Sweat$ fans in Korea, and it will be fun to collaborate,” he said in Korean in the video.Pink Sweat$ has released two EPs, and his latest hit, “Honesty,” is currently sitting in the top 10 list of Spotify’s viral chart.“We look forward to a perfect collaboration between the two vocalists with their charming voices,” said P Nation.By Yoon So-yeon
